item.description:
Another great venu for a hot summers night, high above the hustle & bustle below with stunning views of Boston.

Enjoy the spectacular skyline view of Boston with your favorite friends at this golf course in Quincy. It really is a beautiful view of Boston, the quarries and historical parts of Milton as well.

We will meet on the terrace next to the Tavern bar. In the event of bad weather we will meet inside.

Light appetizers will be provided compliments of the Sitzundjibers Social Club.

Invite a guest if you please.

Directions:

From North: Rt 93, Southeast Expressway to Exit 8 Furnace Brook. Turn right at blinker onto Riccuiti Drive.....

From South: Rt 93, Southeast Expressway, Exit 8, Furnace Brook, Follow signs for Granite Links Golf Club and Quarry Hills. Turn left at bottom of hill under overpass. Stay in right lane to Stop sign. Cross onto Riccuiti Drive. Follow Riccuiti Drive .7 miles past "Archstone" apartment sign, turn left up the hill to golf course. The Tavern is on lower level of Club House.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet on the terrace next to the Tavern bar
item.name: Our 2nd August Afterwork will be high above the city of Boston
